meanings.definition: To make a mistake or error.
meanings.sent1: She always flubs her lines during the play.
meanings.sent2: He flubs his golf swing every time he plays.
meanings.sent3: The comedian flubs his joke, making the audience laugh even more.
meanings.sent4: She flubs her chance to shine like a shooting star.
meanings.sent5: The student flubs the test, causing a big frown on his face.

meanings.definition: A mistake or error made in speech or action.
meanings.sent1: His frequent flubs in the presentation made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent2: The news anchor's flub during the live broadcast went viral.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's cute flub of words made her parents smile.
meanings.sent4: The flub in the system caused a delay in the project.
meanings.sent5: The chef's flub in the recipe turned the dish into a disaster.
